return new Promise(resolve => {
    let message = app.data.message;
    let stepName = app.context["paramExpected"];
    let messageWords = message.split("-").join(" ").split(" ");

    let messageFiltered = [];
    messageWords.forEach(word => {
        if (stopWords.indexOf(word) === -1 && isNaN(word)) {
            messageFiltered.push(word);
        }
    });
    messageFiltered = messageFiltered.join(' ');

    app.setStep(stepName, messageFiltered);
    resolve();
});
